list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make a solemn statement or promise undertaking to do something or affirming that something is the case.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Maria made me swear I would never tell anyone
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Maria làm tôi thề tôi sẽ không bao giờ nói với ai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: use offensive language, especially as an expression of anger.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Peter thề dưới hơi thở của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an offensive word, used especially to express anger; a swear word.
